messages.subject: Re: [UnschoolingDiscussion] Toddler & Teens  was: #2, Tattling
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 12/13/2004 10:55:37 A.M. Eastern Standard Time, Debbies4@comcast.net writes: When my  kids were two years old, I kept waiting for the
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 12/13/2004 10:55:37 A.M. Eastern Standard Time,
Debbies4@... writes:

When my kids were two years old, I
kept waiting for the "terrible two's" which everyone assured me were
just a forerunner of the "terrible teens". The "terrible two's"
never materialized, and neither did the "terrible teens". I loved
having a two-year old and I love having teens.<<<<

Me too. In fact, these are my favorite ages/stages. Toddlers and teens.
Can't get enough! <BWG> Eighteen months to three years and 14-17. What exciting
ages! <g>

~Kelly






[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
